LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.Clarification:
"In range" below considers allowed areas when undrafted, but ignores them when drafted.

Forbidden targets are ignored unless drafted.
This includes checking if they are in allowed areas, or reserved by a pawn.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.BlockedJobs: Better Autocasting for VPE - Blocked Jobs
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.BlockedJobs.Explanatio: Manage which jobs should not be interrupted for autocasting.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.BlockedJobs.Manager.Ex: A list of all JobDefs and a toggle on if it should not be interrupted for autocasting.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.BlockedJobs.Nonexisten: JobDefs that don't exist but are still configured.\nBecause they are from uninstalled mods, removed by updates, etc.\nThey can be kept without problem or cleaned up here.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_AdrenalineRush.Exp: Will autocast whenever they do not have the buff applied.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_BladeFocus.Explana: Will autocast whenever they do not have the buff applied.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_ControlledFrenzy.E: Will autocast whenever they do not have the buff applied.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_Darkvision.Explana: Will autocast whenever they do not have the buff applied.\nOtherwise will target non-downed colonist without the buff in casting range.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_Eclipse.Explanatio: Will autocast when there is no ongoing eclipse
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_EnchantQuality.Exp:
Will look for enchantable items in the order listed below.

When looking for items in stockpiles, will only look in zones containing the word "enchant".
For example: `Enchanting`, `enchant`, `The Enchantress of Florence`
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_FiringFocus.Explan: Will autocast whenever they do not have the buff applied.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_GuidedShot.Explana: Will autocast whenever they do not have the buff applied.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_Invisibility.Expla: Will autocast whenever they do not have the buff applied.\nOtherwise will target non-downed colonist without the buff in casting range.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_Mend.Explanation:
Will look for damaged items in the order listed below.

When looking for items in stockpiles, will only look in zones containing the word "mend".
For example: `Mending`, `mend`, `The First Amendment`
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_PsychicGuidance.Ex: Targets a random non-downed colonist in range that doesn't have the Psychic Guidance buff.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_SpeedBoost.Explana: Will autocast whenever they do not have the buff applied.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_StealVitality.Expl: Targets the pawn with highest psychic sensitivity in range, prioritizing by group in the order below.\nThat is, target prisoners first, if no prisoners are available, then target slaves, and so on.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_WordofImmunity.Exp: Will target the closest pawn in range with an immunizable disease that does not have the Psychic Immunity buff, prioritizing by group in the order below.\nThat is, target colonists first, if no colonists are available, then target colony animals, and so on.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_WordofJoy.Explanat: Targets the closest non-downed colonist in range without the Joyfuzz effect.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_WordofProductivity: Targets a random non-downed colonist in range that doesn't have the Productivity buff.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPE_WordofSerenity.Exp: Targets the closest pawn in range with an ongoing mental state.\nThis can target any pawn, including visitors and animals.\nIgnores babies' crying and giggling mental states.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPEP_BrainLeech.Explan: Targets the closest pawn in range, prioritzing by group in the order below.\nThat is, target prisoners first, if no prisoners are available, then target slaves.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.AutocastIntervalDrafte: Autocasting interval while drafted (only applies to patched psycasts)
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.AutocastIntervalUndraf: Autocasting interval while undrafted (only applies to patched psycasts)
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.MendHealthThreshold.De: Maximum health for an item to be auto-targeted
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.WordOfJoyMoodThreshold: Maximum mood for a pawn to be auto-targeted
